testsuites.name: Hive Test Run
testsuites.testsuite:
Test suite covering the graphql API surface. The GraphQL tests were initially imported from the Besu codebase. (max's change to bump CI). More changes.
This is a meta-test. It launches the client with the test chain and reads the test case files. The individual test cases are run as sub-tests against the client launched by this test. can't launch node (type besu_latest): client did not start: timed out waiting for container startup

This suite of tests verifies that clients can sync from each other in different modes. For each client, we test if it can serve as a sync source for all other clients (including itself).
This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly. can't launch node (type nethermind_latest): client did not start: timed out waiting for container startup

This suite of tests verifies that clients can sync from each other in different modes. For each client, we test if it can serve as a sync source for all other clients (including itself). This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly.
This test attempts to sync the chain from a besu_latest node. besu_latest has new head 276 besu_latest has new head 800 besu_latest has new head 1269 besu_latest has new head 1600 besu_latest has new head 2025 error getting block from besu_latest (91002576): Internal error sync failed: Internal error

This suite of tests verifies that clients can sync from each other in different modes. For each client, we test if it can serve as a sync source for all other clients (including itself).
This test attempts to sync the chain from a go-ethereum_latest node. sync failed: timeout (45s elapsed, current head is 0)
This test attempts to sync the chain from a go-ethereum_latest node. This test attempts to sync the chain from a go-ethereum_latest node.
This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly. can't launch node (type openethereum_latest): client did not start: timed out waiting for container startup
This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly. can't launch node (type aleth_nightly): client did not start: timed out waiting for container startup
This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly.

This loads the test chain into the client and verifies whether it was imported correctly. This test attempts to sync the chain from a besu_latest node.
